title: Data Marketplace Metadata - Error
description: Data Marketplace schema for an error object

code.description: A system specific code for the global error raised

errors.description: An array of the specific error details

message.description: Summary description of the nature of the error

detail.description: Human readable description of the details of the error

instance.description: An identifier of the instance of the object where the error occured

location.description: A pointer to the location of the error within the instance.

severity.description: Severity of error. Could be a level or description.

type.description: A systematic identifier for the type of error.
